name: Scientific AI Workstation
goal: Desktop-style DAW UI for assembling scientific pipelines from plugins; inspect nodes; mock+wire AI planning/chat; mock code editing/diff; no real execution backend.

runtime.ai: real via local dev proxy; fallback to mock planner
runtime.git: mock diff; local git repo optional

modes.editableMode: UI toggle; enables code editing in fullscreen/module editor

env.OPENAI_API_KEY: required for /api/ai/*; read by Vite dev server (NOT shipped to browser)
